data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 9,713 believers in the state of Bugiri with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bugiri, Uganda

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Bugiri, Uganda who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Bugiri, Uganda to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Bugiri, Uganda that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Hindi people.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Bugiri, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Bugiri, Uganda that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Bugiri, Uganda.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

location.name: Bugiri
location.people_groups_list: Karamojong, Nubian, Plains Bira, Meneng, Chinese, general
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Karamojong (849,000), Nubian (37,000), Plains Bira (2,000), Meneng (7,800), Chinese, general (19,000)
